articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: McDonald’s sales fall globally for first time in over three years - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: McDonald’s CEO Chris Kempczinski says low-income consumers eating at home and finding other ways to economise.
articles.content:
McDonalds has reported its first drop in global sales in over three years as inflation-weary consumers seek out cheaper options and cut back on eating out.
McDonalds worldwide sales fell 1 percent i… [+1860 chars]
